Quickstrike:





Quickstrike opened his optics, finding himself in a small, dark place. He 
realized, he was in the CR chamber. It all came back to him why he was in 
here; the auto-guns commanded from Transulas put him into stasis lock, 
turning him into a mess of a bot.

The mouse! He thought of her, him trying to find out who she was. He jolted 
himself into full alert. She could be dead by now, but he had to find out. 
Fighting if he had to.

The door of the chamber lifted, and in an instant, he leaped out and looked 
around. There were some bots by the door. He charged past them, shouldering 
into one, not really taking the care to look who it was.

The ran into the hallway as fast as his short legs could carry him. He came 
across the room where he was shot. He looked in, preparing to see the dead 
mouse, Transulas still in there--but instead it was empty.

He ran back to the crowd, calling, "Where's that mouse-bot? Transulas had 
her!" His curiosity wouldn't back down.
